title: Today is Perfect : Uk Road Trip : Episode 2
description:
TODAY IS PERFECT UK ROAD TRIP -- EPISODE TWO

After a blissful retreat at the Surf Girl Wave & Workout weekender in Mawgan Porth and night surf sessions in Fistral Bay - the Today Is Perfect Road Trip is moving on up in Devon!

The next steps are Croyde, Woolacombe and the cherry on the cake...Somersault Festival.

With music, surfing, wellbeing, food and drink at its heart - Somersault is a family friendly celebration of the good life in that laid back South West style, closely mirroring that imitable Californian lifestyle we know so well. Our road-ready surfer-haven will be on site with High Tide acoustic sessions, a variety of workshops, after-dark screenings and DJs onboard.

Head on over!

Visit the O'Neill website and the Facebook to keep updated and make sure you don't miss a trick!

Take to the road and be at home with O'Neill.
#TodayIsPerfect
